snippet: The move comes after an investigation to “assign accountability” for the disclosure of intelligence secrets by Edward J. Snowden, a former contractor for the National Security Agency.
abstract: National Security Agency tells Congress it has forced out a civilian employee after lengthy investigation to 'assign accountability' for disclosure of intelligence secrets by Edward J Snowden, one of its former contractors.
lead_paragraph: The move comes after an investigation to “assign accountability” for the disclosure of intelligence secrets by Edward J. Snowden, a former contractor for the National Security Agency.

headline.main: N.S.A. Forces Out Civilian Employee With Snowden Tie
headline.print_headline: N.S.A. Forces Out Civilian Employee With Snowden Tie
